description: This Java class is a Spring Boot controller named HomeController that handles web page rendering for the application's main pages, such as home, courses, and about. It uses annotations like @Controller, @GetMapping, and @ModelAttribute to define routes and common model data.

classes.name: HomeController
classes.description: A Spring MVC Controller responsible for handling web requests and rendering server-side views for the main pages of the application.

methods.name: appName
methods.description: Provides a common application name attribute ('Learning App') to all views.

methods.name: index
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the root URL '/', sets page title and highlight, and returns the 'index' template.

methods.name: courses
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/courses', adds course list and view-specific attributes, and returns the 'courses' template.

methods.name: about
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/about', adds page-specific attributes, and returns the 'about' template.
